title: "The Mind-Reader: Leo's Journey into the Invisible"
premise: Leo is a typical young man in his early 20s, living a mundane life, until one morning, he wakes up to find that he can read minds. At first, he thinks it's just a dream, but as he goes about his daily routine, he discovers that his newfound ability is very real. He can not only hear the thoughts of those around him, but also enters their memories, experiences their emotions, and even manipulate their thoughts.
